name: Lightweight Hull
desc:
Uses lightweight material in the construction of the hull, significantly reduces the ship's tonnage.

Reduces fuel use by %s.
Increases maximum burn level by %s.
Increases the ship's maneuverability by %s.
Increases the ship's top speed in combat by %s.
Reduces hull integrity by %s.
Reduces armor by %s.
short: Reduces fuel usage and increases mobility.
